Text: VivianceEnron elearning update Cc Hello Tom I have left several messages for you and have not heard back on where you and your team are with your elearning initiatives Our understanding was that you would contact us with an update after your meeting with Tim on May It is now May and we still have not heard back from you Do you need additional information from Viviance If so please let me know I believe I provided everything you requested If you need more time I certainly understand I am in Detroit meeting with customers through Thursday but can be reached on my cell phone at or a simple email response would be great We look forward to hearing from you soon and I hope all is well Regards Jim Martino Sr Vice President of Sales North America Viviance new education Inc East Sixth St Ste Austin Texas Tel Fax website wwwviviancecom email We increase your Return on Education
